About

VMAPS is a service company providing expertise in GIS related applications. We have strong expirience in:

  • Telecommunications: Fiber to the home and other applications
  • Metropolitan transport and road planning
  • Geospatial analysis
  • City Urban Planning

Also we have expirience in such areas:

  • Radio planning - the basis for radio planning
  • Energy Forecasting
  • Agriculture sector

In addition, we are also looking forward to various other projects employing GIS Technology. We are open to other projects.

Services
Population maps
The population distribution model is an important element of mapping data for geomarketing purposes. For example, for planning and optimizing telecommunications networks. This model is built on the data of the last official census in the region and can be used to display data at the time of the census, at the current time or used to predict population growth for the near future. Our model allows you to process the population distribution values with a high level of detail, which allows you to use these maps for engineering purposes.
Telecommunications
Our GIS services contribute in all phases of the telecom project lifecycle:
  • - Survey phase: Geo-coordinates mapping, Road / water canal crossing and etc.
  • - Network Planning: Distribution Points location, Duct / Trench / Fiber routes, Demand points, Access / Distribution / Fiber / Ducts
  • - Final Network Design: Low level details, Access / Distribution BoM / BoQ, Splice Sheets, Schematics, Field Templates
  • - Network Database: Access / Distribution Splices, Equipment and details. Port Connectivity details
Maps and plans
In connection with the development of information technologies, a qualitatively new, more sophisticated tool for digital mapping has appeared. Using the experience of developing world leaders in the GIS industry along with our own solutions allowed us to optimize the technology of creating maps and plans, while respecting all the necessary standards. The technology of creating maps allows us to significantly improve the quality of work and, at the same time, reduce labor costs. This, in turn, makes it possible to create favorable conditions for our customers.
Wireless planning
As the telecommunications industry moves steadily forward, network planners need to build and optimize even denser networks that improve coverage, bandwidth and latency while avoiding added interference and managing costs. Access to accurate and highly detailed geodata for use in your planning software is critical to help you achieve optimal usage of network infrastructure investment. Our company manufactures cost-effective data for this needs and we have specialized in creating digital geodata for the wireless telecommunications industry.
Land Use - Urban, Rural, Building type. GIS in Agriculture
Land use involves the management and modification of natural environment or wilderness into built environment such as settlements and semi-natural habitats such as arable fields, pastures, and managed woods. It also has been defined as "the total of arrangements, activities, and inputs that people undertake in a certain land cover type.
What you will achive with us
  • Using our professional skills and free software, we can provide any output materials and formats to meet the desire and needs of our customers.
  • GIS is a system of hardware and software used for storage, retrieval, mapping, and analysis of geographic data.
  • Computer Aided Design is the use of a wide range of computer based tools that assist engineers, achitects and other design professionals in their design activities.
  • Field survey, existing drawings, old paper maps
  • GIS data can be saved in the format, that suits your needs best: KML/KMZ, SHP, TAB/MIF, GeoJSON, CSV, TIFF, ECW etc.
Benefits for our clients
Leveraging of Spatial benefits
Time and process optimization: Minimized re-works
Reduced cost
Effectiveness and accuracy of the planning processes
Products
VMaps Geodata Virtualizer (GDV)
GIS Portal GDV for desktop devicesData for Wireless planning
Web portal with your data will provide easy and fast access to your data without affecting the high level of protection and safety of your information. The web portal can be open for general use or at the request of a client with limited access and only for certain users.
GIS Portal GDV for tablet devices
The GDV portal is a handy tool with your GIS data, that will always be at your fingertips, as it can easily be used on your laptop, tablet and even on your mobile phone.
GIS Portal GDV for tablets and mobiles
This application will open a number of very useful features to collect new and edit existing information right in the field from your smartphone or tablet. For work, the application uses the built-in GPS module. This removes the need for expensive equipment and as a result will significantly reduce the cost of ongoing work.
